content.contents:
the cover for my eighth single, the first to feature a b-side or part 2, 'sometimes i feel like an executable'
yes, sometimes i do. what does that mean? well, what is an executable? i'll let you think about that, i'd rather not spell it out for you, but if you don't get it, maybe go read the lyrics to the main track and b-side. they're available on my bandcamp.
i love this cover. i think it's so pretty, it looks very... water-colory. the streaks of rust and moss come through and contrast the deep purples and blues so well. it's another cover that i feel very well matches the track to which it's pertained.
the original image was taken straight from the laserdisc boxset of serial experiments lain. the set comes with various inserts of artwork created for the show, and it's one of my most prized posessions. see it below, as well as the original picture:

the insert is unfortunately quite red, the lighting in my room isn't great. the walls are pink. i would've preferred a scan but i don't have one big enough to scan the whole picture, and splicing it together would be quite the undertaking. 
yes, that is duvet on CD single. not to flex :3c
